This project is a React calculator app scaffolded with Vite. Use functional components, hooks, and modular code. Prioritize clean code, inline comments, and modern UI. Include Jest and React Testing Library tests. Components: Calculator, Display, Button, HistoryPanel. History should persist during session. Use icons for buttons and responsive layout.
